lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Hala madrid!

lines.speaker: Son
lines.line: Visca el Barça!

lines.speaker: Son
lines.line: I think this year we might win the treble this year again.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: No, Madrid is going to win it.

lines.speaker: Son
lines.line: Impossible, you were beaten by Arsenal.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Today we'll win the cup, then the league and finally the Club World Cup.

lines.speaker: Son
lines.line: Dad, you're so hilarious when we watch football.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Oh, not again.

lines.speaker: Son
lines.line: Have you already accepted that you'll get trashed again?

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Oh shoot, I forgot my boss scheduled me to work this Saturday.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Champ, I need you to go for me again. I can't miss this final.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: I'm sure we lost last time because of my absence.

lines.speaker: Son
lines.line: Dad! I'm sure this time I'm going to get caught.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Don't worry, you'll do fine.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Just remember to wear the fake mustache.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: And above all, remember to work like your old man would.

lines.speaker: Son
lines.line: Ok, dad. I'll try to do my best.

lines.speaker: Mr. Circle
lines.line: Working during a Barça-Madrid should be considered a war crime. Don't you think, boss?

lines.speaker: Boss
lines.line: You could ben home watching the game if you hadn't messed up so badly on the last General Journal.

lines.speaker: Boss
lines.line: Fix your mess and you're free to go.

lines.speaker: Mr. Circle
lines.line: (Oh, dad. What have you gotten me into this time?)

lines.speaker: Phone
lines.line: RING RING RINGGGGGGGGGG!!!

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Champ, you'll never guess who just had scored?

lines.speaker: Mr. Circle
lines.line: Dad, I don't have time for this. I'm busy doing YOUR WORK.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Hey, take it easy, kiddo.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: I'm calling you beacuase I just remembered why I had extra work.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: The boss probably asked you to fix my mistakes on the General Journal.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Look in accounting there's a thing we call the rule of double entry..

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: It means that for every debit, there's a credit.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Think of it like a seesaw, everything has to be balanced.

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: If the totals don't match, you probably messed something up.

lines.speaker: T.V.
lines.line: And here comes Lamine Yamal!

lines.speaker: Father
lines.line: Gotta go, champ. Good luck!

lines.speaker: System
lines.line: You heard the boss. Click on the stack of papers to get started.
